subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Chris Gould kicked a 19-yard field goal with 3 minutes 20 seconds remaining yesterday as Virginia won its sixth consecutive game and handed visiting Connecticut its first loss, 17-16.
snippet: Chris Gould kicked a 19-yard field goal with 3 minutes 20 seconds remaining yesterday as Virginia won its sixth consecutive game and handed visiting Connecticut its first loss, 17-16.
